upload.national_id_intro: According to the latest regulatory requirements, real name verification is required.
upload.national_id_upload_text: Please take a photo of the front and back of your ID.
upload.profile_photo_intro: Please take or upload a photo for your profile
upload.profile_photo_upload_text: Please take or upload a photo for your profile
upload.health_cert_intro: Health is very important and to work with Elders you must hold a current Health Certificate. You can obtain one from most hospitals.
upload.health_cert_upload_text: Please take a photo of the front and back of your certificate.
upload.residential_permit_intro: If you require residential permit. Please take a photo of both front and back.
upload.residential_permit_upload_text: If you require a residential permit please take a photo of both front and back.
